resources.string: After the plants emerged, try to visit your field 1-2 times per week.
Check different parts of the field. Each visit, follow different scouting patterns such as the illustration below. Walk a path in the field with these scouting patterns.
Examine the crop by checking on the leaves, stems, buds, and fruits. Check the plants for discoloration, deformation, and feeding damages which indicate pest activities.
When you find a sign of infestation, use the identification feature of this app to identify the pest and use the provided information to make control decisions.
